import React from 'react' import '../css/audiomessage.css' import { Avatar } from '@material-ui/core' function AudioMessage({message,sender,image}) { let messageColor ='' return (
{messageColor = sender=== 'chat_message chat_reciever'? 'sender' : 'reciever' }
{(message.timeSent).substring(11,17)}

) } export default AudioMessage
